title: Programming courses - Java, C, OCaml, HTML, JS, Node, NoSQL
description: Learn about Java, C, OCaml, Web-related languages (HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, Node) and databases-related languages (SQL, NoSQL). We also have courses about Assembly, TypeScript, Cybersecurity, and API.

e1.name: OCaml
e1.title: Learn OCAML programming
e1.desc: OCaml may be used when you need to write a safe programs (as it is a functional language). It's quite easy to learn, almost no syntax.

e2.name: WEB
e2.title: Learn WEB-related knowledge
e2.desc: How to start, what you need to know, ... and everything that couldn't be put in a specific language course.

e2.name: HTML
e2.title: Learn HTML programming
e2.desc: A complete summary of what you need to know in HTML to make a website.

e2.name: CSS
e2.title: Learn CSS programming
e2.desc: What's CSS and how you could use it to make your website looks better.

e2.name: JavaScript
e2.title: Learn JavaScript programming
e2.desc: A short introduction to JavaScript used to make interactive websites or required for Node.js/Typescript courses.

e3.name: Cryptography
e3.title: Learn Cryptography
e3.desc: An introduction to cryptography (Modular arithmetic, encryption and decryption of messages, RSA)
